document.full_text: mcdonald's corp  reported a lower-than-expected rise in may sales at established restaurants as high gasoline prices crimped u.s. spending and europe's economic woes weakened results from germany.
document.title: gas prices, economy hit mcdonald's may sales
lines_and_colors: mcdonald's corp  reported a lower-than-expected rise in may sales at established restaurants as high gasoline prices crimped u.s. spending and europe's economic woes weakened results from germany.
